We LOVED all the swinging bridges and hidden gems that Henry has built over the years! Walk the trails, slow down, take pictures, enjoy nature! UN-PLUG! RELAX! Henry was a treat as a host. I would recommend bringing groceries, stopping by Walmart to pickup cold groceries on the way in and cooking your meals at the treehouse. After all, isn't this fabulous treehouse WHY you came? If you are staying several days I would recommend this, but if only for a few days then skip it and enjoy staying put! We planned our trip for over a year and we are SO glad to finally be able to book it and go! We will definitely be back! WONDERFUL FAMILY MEMORIES WERE MADE AT TOUCAN TREEHOUSE!!! Thanks again Henry and GOD BLESS!!!
